name: atheos
description: Atheos is a self-hosted web-based IDE designed for fast development workflows. It includes file management, syntax highlighting, and plugins, all within the browser without needing traditional desktop editors.
features: Web-Based IDE: Code directly in your browser without desktop software. Develop anywhere.
File Management: Complete project file organization and navigation. Structured workspace.
Syntax Highlighting: Support for multiple programming languages. Professional editing.
Plugin System: Extend functionality with custom plugins. Customizable environment.
Fast Workflows: Optimized for quick development cycles. Efficient coding.
Self-Hosted: Run your own development environment. Complete control.
Collaborative: Multiple users can work on same server. Team development.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage for smooth performance. Fast and responsive.
